channel.title: Aleksandr Grin on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Aleksandr Grin on Rusland 1

item.title: Learn Russian with Short Stories (2): Max Reads Grin
item.description: Read! Зелёная лампа tells the story of a beggar who, in exchange for money, must keep a lamp burning for several hours each day and stay by it. What seems like a cruel prank or humiliation turns out to present opportunities.
